title: What are some champions that need their ability nerfed?

replies.body: Pantheon aegis is broken but I wouldn't nerf it. IF anything I'd clean up his mechanics, sometimes it feels like stun has a 50% land rate (hits or goes on cd with no stun/dmg effect procing).
Blitzcrank grab is pretty much a guaranteed kill on a fairly short cooldown late game.

Urgot, he has infiniTe sustain and a massive shield which can block everything on a 2 second cooldown. His Q has global range and costs no mana. There's no point in getting armor because of his 2000% armor shred. He can bring anyone on the map to his team and get a pentakill by placing himself in the middle of the team with 0.1 cds.
Oddly enough I just watched Bjergsen on Twitch dominate with Urgot.
Yay, first discussion on Gameplay & Strategy on the Board. :D{{champion:103}}
